attributes.comment:
I am appalled by the proposed rate hikes. With the economic divide between rich
and poor growing at exponential rates, and immigration becoming more and more
difficult with immigrants being discriminated against on every level in our
society, what has happened to the ideals on which the United States was
founded?!? The Denver Post reported that these proposed increases will make the
United States the most expensive country to legally immigrate to in the world!
This is astounding when one considers the cost of living in many other countries
is much higher than in the US.

Even as two chemistry Ph.D.s, my Canadian husband and I are wondering how we
will afford these rates for his immigration. Perhaps we will move to Canada
after all, they don't discriminate against immigrants as much, and their crime
rates are much lower to boot. Plus, who can beat 1-year maternity leave!

Yours truly,
Guinevere Murphy, Ph.D.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Guinevere Murphy
